Package gnat.representation

Interface Summary
FeatureVector A FeatureVector representing a document, text, etc.
 

Class Summary
Context Context for NEI processing.
This context keeps track of recognized entities and their identification status.
Context.IdentifiedGeneIdComparator A comparator to compare identified genes by their text ID and gene ID (disregards gene names).
Context.IdentifiedGeneNameComparator A comparator to compare identified genes by their text ID, gene name, and gene ID.
Context.RecognizedEntityComparator A comparator to compare entities by their text range begin index.
ContextModel A context model represents the typical context a term occurs in.
ContextVector  
DefaultFeatureVector Represents a feature vector.
Evidence  
Feature A feature representing an attribute, property, or predicate etc.
Gene Represents a gene: ID, names, and annotations in a ContextModel.
GeneContextModel  
GeneFactory Provides static factory methods to obtain Genes and GeneRepositorys.
GeneRepository  
IdentificationStatus Keep track of the identification status for a recognized gene name: current/remaining candidate IDs, and whether it has been finally identified.
IdentifiedGene Represents an identified gene, i.e.
RecognizedEntity Represents a recognized entity in a text.
ScoredGene  
ScoredName TODO describe me
Text Represents a text object, with source text, text context model, and annotations.
TextAnnotation  
TextContextModel  
TextFactory A text factory reads input from files and generates Text objects from them.
TextPositionModel Stores frequencies of tokens at different positions.
TextPositionModel.StringIntegerPair  
TextRange TODO describe me
TextRepository  
VectorGenerator Generates feature vector instances from lists of tokens to represent texts.
